苦手なFPSの克服になるかと思ったが､やっぱりダメな物はダメ｡撃っても撃ってもあたらないし､何十回死んだか解らない｡ストーリーが良いとのことだったので期待したがそれもイマイチ､最後はポカーン｡一人称は自分がどこに向っているか､どこから攻撃されているか､どこへ向ったらいいか全然解らないので途中から苦痛ばかり｡人の家に勝手に入って無抵抗の婦人や銃で家人を守ろうとする家主を問答無用で撃ち殺すのは気分のいいものじゃない｡せめて犯罪者かゾンビなら罪悪感無いんだけどなあ｡自分の都合で他人に迷惑をかけるなんてどれだけ無法者なんだよと､この辺は洋ゲーでは仕方の無いことですかね｡セールで買って良かった｡もうFPSはやりたく無いけどストアのおすすめでバンバン出てくるのがウンザリ｡

Honestly, one of the most interesting and fun games I've ever played. The story is amazing, artstyle and overall aesthetics are breath taking, voice acting is incredible. Nothing bad I could say about this game, in my opinion this is a must have for everyone who likes story-influenced singleplayer games.

Hikaye olarak da aksiyon olarak da ayrı ayrı tatmin etti oyun beni.. Neredeyse hiç sıkılmadan bitirdim. Sonunu pek anlayamasam da genel hikayesine ve işlenişine bayıldım. Özellikle Elizabethle baş başa geçen asansör sahneleri hikaye anlatımı açısından aşırı tatminkar olmuş. Aksiyonu da özel yetenekler ve silah çeşitliliğiyle mutlaka eğlenecek bi yol bulmanızı sağlıyor. Oynayın oynattırın nesilden nesile devam etsin bu oyun..

Tremenda joya es este titulo. La historia y jugabilidad son muy soprendentes. En cuanto a graficos, pues si bien es un juego que ya tiene rato, se sigue viendo decente.Compralo no te vas arrepentir, mas aun si lo agarras de ofertapd: el que te diga que es el peor bioshock es un nostafalg que quiere que todos los juegos sean un copy-paste.
Bioshock, Bioshock 2 and Bioshock Infinite all together have and probably will have the best story of all FPS games.

[h1] 艺术设计：10分！[/h1]
美术风格极具特色，哥伦比亚城的架构和设计充满想象力，色彩搭配、场景变化，堪称梦幻。加上精妙的选曲和配乐，我很难不给好评。
[h1] 玩法：8分！[/h1]
作为一个第一人称射击游戏，玩法上没有很特别的地方，枪战突突突+捡垃圾就完事儿了（DLC《海葬2》则主打潜行）。伊丽莎白作为人形补给仓给你打辅助，能一直续航突突突，难度不是特别高，对枪有时还挺爽的。 “异能/质体”系统是比较有趣的设计，[spoiler]乌鸦永远的神[/spoiler]，有点惊艳。
[h1] 剧情：7分？[/h1]
1.名为“无限”，剧情也确实很“无限”，但我不能给出很高分。游戏本体里的剧情，开头就是结尾，结尾就是开头，精妙而依旧充满想象力。但整个剧情过程，过于单调：找某人→找某物→突突突→找到某物→回到某人处→提出新的条件→重复……玩家感觉不到人物的思想和变化，单纯充当跑图机器。这种模式，在《海葬》两部曲里尤为明显，以至于影响游戏体验。
2.悲剧内核贯穿始终，很出彩；但剧情的过分悲伤，磨灭了所有的希望和理想。人物方面，无论是布克，还是伊丽莎白，还是其他配角，都以不同形式的悲剧收场；故事及背景方面，哥伦比亚和销魂城都不是什么好地方，随处可见的影像机、会说话的假人、电台，都在讲着各式各样的矛盾、斗争、杀戮、悲剧。哥伦比亚太美了，但是又太令人讨厌了。一道道门的后面，究竟有谁获得了幸福和快乐呢？答案是：没有。全是悲剧，全都该死——也许是我不够深入，看不懂看不透，但按我目前的了解来看，不能以之为高明。
3.隐喻很多，讽刺现实的意味很浓。圆滑而又尖锐地攻击了资本家，又阴阳怪气地黑了一把革命党；对宗教意见很大，但又对科学家有各种成见；打造无政府的故事背景，反过来又搞恶政隐；人畜无害的伊丽莎白深挖的话发现她也不是什么好鸟，而我竟是穷凶极恶的康姆斯托克。在我看来这部作品把所有人都黑了一遍。但问题在于，一番批评之后却没有提出正确的方向，一直说如何如何不行却又不谈应该怎么搞——也许是我不够深入，看不懂看不透，但按我目前的了解来看，不能以之为高明。
4.科学与魔幻交织，架构精妙，令人赞叹，但最后却没能把故事讲好。表现为时间线混乱到说不清，《海葬2》通关之后我一头雾水；一大堆反派但最后没几个令人印象深刻的；做了一大堆任务，玩完这个游戏我不知道它到底想表达什么。——也许是我不够深入，看不懂看不透，但按我目前的了解来看，不能以之为高明。
[h1] 总评：8.17分[/h1]
以我个人对游戏各方面的重视程度来加权，艺术设计2，玩法1，剧情3
计算结果：(10×2+8×1+7×3)÷6=8.17
值得一玩！
História interessante, habilidades divertidas e arte magnífica para a época. Porém, achei demasiado curto.

Great game one of the better games I've played in a while. Super memorable, good characters and a good story with an interesting twist not to mention the gorgeous environment! I would give this a solid 8 out of 10!

大促买的合集包，近几天把无限本体和海葬俩DLC通关了。久闻bioshock系列作为第九艺术代表之盛名，也经常听到别人谈论角色AI的时候，伊丽莎白总是排在第一梯队里。经历了布克和伊丽莎白两者的自我救赎后，心情迟迟未能平静，尤其是海葬结尾，经阅读大量游戏补充资料后，明白了伊丽莎白的动机，为了弥补自己为复仇利用小妹妹的过失，放弃已成为全知全能的身份，在游戏里叫利他主义，而在我看来，这是需要多大的勇气才能完成的大义。无论是那个在阳光海滩上翩翩起舞的少女，还是那个成熟曼妙身姿的御姐，和伊丽莎白的冒险经历会永远留存在我脑海里

worthy of the hype. It's a lot less horror than bioshock 1 and 2, but for a pussy like me that's a good thing. gunplay isn't the best but the story and atmosphere are captivating. encounters are well designed and you are encouraged to use new abilities.

edit: the last 2 hours are an emotional roller coaster and the game does a great job at creating atmosphere. The ending is pure perfection and extremely haunting and satisfying. The gunplay I previously mentioned is probably by design, as the amount of vigors you juggle through at the second half of the playthrough adds an incredible amount of depth.

Excelente jogo, com história muito envolvente. O visual é incrível, muito criativo e, provavelmente, é o que, além da jogabilidade muito intuitiva e da história, o que faz o jogo brilhar mais. Campeão dos campeões da histórria dos Bioshocks. Entretanto, a conclusão da história é bastante confusa, o que me desapontou um pouco (a falta de clareza no final). Ótima experiência, memorável. Ainda falta jogar a primeira das expansões lançadas. As duas outras eu joguei e são ótimas. Comprei em uma promo. Vale a pena.
1. 온클하면서 하기 꿀임2. 스토리가 좋음3. 살짝 멀미나고 어지러운데 참고 할만하다4. fps라서 더욱 재미있다5. 피지컬 좋으면 깨기 더욱 쉽다

很畅快，一周目刚刚结束首先是打击感觉得不错，毕竟是第一次尝试fps游戏，我觉得对于新人玩家是很友好的异能的设置很喜欢，对不同类型的怪用什么效果的异能很值得琢磨，异能获取的动画很帅气游戏背景氛围是很有感觉的反乌托邦和蒸汽朋克风，沉浸体验感很好枪的种类正好处在不少但是不至于杂乱的区间，游戏里面出的tip对新手记住不同枪的性能有帮助引导很棒，对路痴真的很友好，只是在空轨上找路有时候真的让人爆炸，导航箭头有点短而且颜色在空轨上太淡了（经常飞着飞着箭头就不见了，背对正确的路线的时候看不到导航箭头）最后是剧情，很震撼，体系很大，刚开始云里雾里的看结局，后来查了一下才清楚到底是怎么回事，很好的故事，故事参与感真的巨强一定会好几周目的，老游戏真的很优质了

Some say that BioShock Infinite is the worst in the BioShock series. I wholeheartedly disagree. The gunplay and powers are great - both feel fluid and responsive. The story is a wonderful tale that I won't discuss to much for fear of spoilers. The ending is memorable. 

I've played this a few times on the PS4. Having recently gotten a gaming PC, I had to replay this classic as my first FPS on PC. 

If you're a fan of the BioShock series, this game is a must.

Love Bioshock Infinite. Great story telling and great game play. Been hooked on the Bioshock series for years (except for Bioshock2, it's OK but you can tell Irrational wasn't involved) hoping they put out a fourth and they don't drop the ball now that Irrational isn't around.

Overall, an excellent game with excellent mechanics, characters, and story. The locations were vibrant and lively and reward exploration. The combat was exhilarating and satisfying. The level design, enemies, and AI were good. The characters and their development throughout the story were well thought out and written. The story itself was mind-blowing and the ending was one that will stick with me for a while.

greatest one from the series
Excelente en todo aspecto: HISTORIA, jugabilidad, duración y coleccionables.

1. The autosave function is just plain bad. At one point i ran around over 15 minutes before it finally saved. After a boss fight! I understand they wanted to finally bring death peril into the game. But like that is just not thought trough.

2. Also boss fight mecanics in which the boss spawns unlimited minions in very fast progression with very little ammo, no refill after death and boss healing after death. After the first fight i thougth, well that was a shitty fight, hope i dont have to do that again. 30 Minutes later, same boss fight, only more almost instantly respawning minions.
Dont get me wrong, i died 2 times in the highes difficulty setting before this particular boss. The mechanic is just plain bad for the set of weapons you get there.

3. Which brings me to the final point. There are a lot of weapons with a lot of them functioning almost the same. Weapons like the pistol are just garbage after the start, even after upgraded damage empting a whole clip into enemies wont do much at all. Also there are 2 very similar shotguns, several automatic rifles, several hand guns. You start not picking up most of them, only if you in dire need of ammo.

4. The plot is very forced.

经常崩溃。。。。。

It is an impressive game, surpassed all my expectations. The visuals are a high point, simply beautiful and well inspired. The colours, the lighting, the details make me wonder how it was possible to run on last-gen consoles. The story holds the player and, although quite complex, it is still enjoyable. After playing this game, it is no surprise that it is considered one of the best of the last-gen era. I wish we have the same level of quality in current games, that are becoming bigger but less interesting.
Astonishing world-building with unique and creative philosophies. The gameplay isn't for everyone but the story-telling compensates more than enough. Truly a memorable game to experience.

Game is great so far. It is getting a bit repetitive. Though the story line is great and I find amusement in switching gear to do some wack stuff. I think the price depends more on your situation, if you don't have a good budget to spend games on maybe wait until it's on sale due to the age of the game. If you don't have a budget though I think base price is fine.

No tengo forma de escribir sobre que tan buen juego es, solo puedo decir que tienen que jugarlo al menos una vez, en mi opinión la historia es increíble y bastante bien narrada, sin decir que la evolución de los personajes es fluida, o que la atmósfera es magnífica por lo fascinante y tensa que se puede llegar a poner; pero si tuviera que resaltar un pequeño detalle que no me convenció del todo, es que solo puedas elegir dos armas ,lo cual en los otros bioshocks no pasa, pero esos son detalles pequeños en un increíble juego. Lo único que puedo decir es que cada centavo lo vale.
2013年的游戏真的nb嗷
Muy buen juego modo historia, entretenido y nunca se vuelve tedioso.

A fantastic successor to the original Bioshock.  While I miss the underwater environment, being above the clouds with the rail system adds a great new mechanic to the game.  If you enjoyed the original, I feel like you would enjoy this as well.

This game is a must play. I was left speechless for three days after I finished it. The writing is top tier. Definitely in my top three games of all time. do yourself a favor and buy it.

It's interesting as a stand alone game. It isn't really in the same league as Bioshock or Bioshock II. The companion action was largely well thought out and added a lot to the story. What I missed the most was feeling that each NPC had a back story and was just unluckier than me. That made the other games so great.
